question: Which Union Minister is recently elected as the President of the Archery Association of India (AAI)?
explanation:
Union Minister of Tribal Affairs and former Jharkhand Chief Minister Arjun Munda was recently elected as the president of the suspended Archery Association of India (AAI). The entire panel of Arjun Munda was elected for the full tenure of four years. Munda also runs an archery academy, which trains several archers.
During the month of August last year, the World Archery suspended the national federation of AAI, after it conducted parallel elections in Delhi and Chandigarh, which was against the international bodyâ€™s guidelines.
